refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the current value of a MIDI channel controller.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Get the current value of a controller and optionally map it onto specified range.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ival chanctrl ichnl, ictlno [, ilow] [, ihigh]
kval chanctrl ichnl, ictlno [, ilow] [, ihigh]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ilow, ihigh -- low and high ranges for mapping

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
